notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: All the data used in this article are public (free access) and available at the following URLs: http://www.mapama.gob.es/es/biodiversidad/temas/inventarios-nacionales/inventario-especies-terrestres/inventario-nacional-de-biodiversidad/bdn-ieet-default.aspx (Bird data), http://www.ign.es/web/ign/portal/cbg-area-cartografia (Topography variables: ALTI, SLOP, SRTM V1 digital elevation model), http://www.aemet.es/en/lineas_de_interes/datos_y_estadistica (Agencia Estatal de Meteorología, Spain, Climate variables: PREC, TEMP), http://www.mapama.gob.es/es/biodiversidad/servicios/banco-datos-naturaleza/informacion-disponible/mfe50.aspx (Land use and forest cover variables: PINE_COVER, OCONIF_COVER, EUC_COVER, OBROADL_COVER, SHRUBLAND_COVER, PASTURE_COVER, AGR_COVER, URBAN_COVER, WATER_COVER, OTHER_COVER; Spanish Forest Map, 1:50000), http://www.mapama.gob.es/es/biodiversidad/servicios/banco-datos-naturaleza/informacion-disponible/ifn3.aspx (Forest composition and structure variables: TREE_DIV, TREE_DENSITY, TREE_BA, DBH_CV, MONOSP_CH, TREE_HEIGHT, SHRUB_DIV, SHRUB_CC, SHRUB_HEIGHT; Third Spanish Forest Inventory), and http://wwwsp.inia.es/Investigacion/centros/CIFOR/redes/Genfored/Sig-Forest/Paginas/DistribucionEspecies.aspx (Pinus plantation variable: P_PLANT, Alía et al. (2009)).
